title: Campbell's Kitchen Chicken Broccoli Divan Recipe
description: This Campbell's chicken and broccoli casserole features cooked meat, condensed soup, and Cheddar cheese baked with a buttery bread crumb topping.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Dinner Campbell's Kitchen Chicken Broccoli Divan 4.4 (184) 136 Reviews 32 Photos This Campbell's chicken and broccoli casserole features a cheesy sauce, which stirs together easily. Bake until piping hot and serve with hot biscuits or noodles. Submitted by Campbell's Kitchen Updated on August 7, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 32 32 32 32 Prep Time: 15 mins Cook Time: 25 mins Total Time: 40 mins Servings: 4 Yield: 1 2-quart casserole Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 1 pound fresh broccoli, cut into spears 1 ½ cups cubed cooked chicken or turkey 1 (10.5 ounce) can Campbell's condensed broccoli cheese soup ⅓ cup milk ½ cup shredded Cheddar cheese 2 tablespoons dry bread crumbs 1 tablespoon butter or margarine, melted Directions Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C). Arrange broccoli and cooked chicken in a 2-quart shallow baking dish or 9-inch pie plate. Stir together condensed soup and milk in a medium bowl until combined, then pour over all. Sprinkle with cheese. Mix together bread crumbs and melted butter in a small bowl; sprinkle on top. Bake casserole in the preheated oven until hot, about 25 minutes. Recipe Tips You can substitute Campbell's condensed cream of chicken soup, or you can use the fat-free version of either soup.To make 1 1/2 cups of cubed cooked chicken, cut 12 ounces of skinless, boneless chicken breast into cubes. Cook it in 4 cups of boiling water in a medium saucepan until no longer pink and the juices run clear, about 5 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).You can broil the casserole for about 1 minute after baking to lightly brown the topping. I Made It Print 337 home cooks made it! Add Your Photo Photos of Campbell's Kitchen Chicken Broccoli Divan 01 of 32 Photo by  Jen 02 of 32 Photo by  Yam 03/28/2023 Came out pretty yummy.I knew raw broccoli would not work so I streamed it with a half a red pepper cause I like color and flavor. Chopped both up and spread in greased glass pie plate.I also sliced up some fresh mushroom because I had one the layered on top. Use the breast-meat from the rotisserie chicken from Sam's. Used Campbell Healthy Request Cheese Soup so it’s not salty. And sprinkled Mozzarella on top cause it’s what I had. 😋 03 of 32 Photo by  TrustySake4637 09/28/2022 I liked it but it needed a little oomph. I added a few drops of hot sauce and diced tomato/ great, easy dinner option. 04 of 32 Photo by  Kimberley Oyler 06/28/2021 05 of 32 Photo by  BPMargieD 12/01/2020 I made a few changes, mainly because of what I had on hand. Used Cream of Chicken soup, leftover turkey from Thanksgiving and instead of bread crumbs I used crushed Ritz crackers. Then I added bacon! I cooked up 3 slices of bacon and crumbled them on top prior to baking it. It was delicious and easy! 06 of 32 Photo by  Becky Klaerner 07/13/2020 07 of 32 Photo by  Viva Jo 05/26/2020 Good kids love it 08 of 32 Photo by  Jen 04/30/2020 09 of 32 Photo by  Dlm 08/18/2019 10 of 32 Photo by  lacyld1985 08/14/2019 1 2 3 4 Next You’ll Also Love Cheesy Chicken Broccoli Bake 29 Ratings Chicken Divan Lasagna 19 Ratings Creamy Chicken and Broccoli Casserole 97 Ratings Broccoli Chicken Casserole II 145 Ratings Cheddar Broccoli and Chicken Casserole from Country Crock® 29 Ratings Broccoli Chicken Divan 2,074 Ratings Silver's Savory Chicken and Broccoli Casserole 230 Ratings Breeze Chicken, Broccoli, and Rice Casserole 16 Ratings Cheesy Chicken and Broccoli Casserole 55 Ratings Curried Chicken and Broccoli Casserole 129 Ratings Chicken Divan Casserole 49 Ratings Keto Chicken-Broccoli Casserole 44 Ratings Cheesy Chicken, Broccoli, and Rice Casserole 8 Ratings Baked Bacon Ranch Chicken and Pasta Cheesy Broccoli and Chicken Casserole 95 Ratings Keto Creamy Chicken and Vegetable Bake 10 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: Campbell's Kitchen
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C).;Arrange broccoli and cooked chicken in a 2-quart shallow baking dish or 9-inch pie plate. Stir together condensed soup and milk in a medium bowl until combined, then pour over all. Sprinkle with cheese. Mix together bread crumbs and melted butter in a small bowl; sprinkle on top.;Bake casserole in the preheated oven until hot, about 25 minutes.
